enhanced_by.reason: getOrAddSchema method checks if the schema is already cached before calling addSchema, ensuring proper state management.
processSchemaQueue method processes the schema queue, which includes the schemas added by addSchema, ensuring proper execution order.
getChangedSchemas method retrieves the processed schemas, which can be used to verify the output of addSchema.
process method ensures that all deferred operations, including those added by addSchema, are processed, allowing for verification of the final state.
